Uses of Class
org.gearvrf.GVRCameraRig

  • Packages that use GVRCameraRig 
    Package Description
    org.gearvrf
    You need to understand key points of this package to create a GVRF application.

    • Uses of GVRCameraRig in org.gearvrf

      Methods in org.gearvrf that return GVRCameraRig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GVRCameraRig GVRSceneObject.getCameraRig()
      Get the attached GVRCameraRig
      GVRCameraRig GVRScene.getMainCameraRig() 
      Methods in org.gearvrf with parameters of type GVRCameraRig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GVRSceneObject.attachCameraRig(GVRCameraRig cameraRig)
      Attach a new camera rig. If another camera rig is currently attached, it is replaced with the new one.
      static float GVRPicker.pickSceneObject(GVRSceneObject sceneObject, GVRCameraRig cameraRig)
      Tests the GVRSceneObject against the camera rig's lookat vector.
      void GVRScene.setMainCameraRig(GVRCameraRig cameraRig)
      Set the camera rig used for rendering the scene on the screen.
